EmailTemplate.name: YETI Custom Logo Inquiry
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your call today. Attached is the information about the custom logo program. If you have questions or would like a quote, please complete the Custom Logo Inquiry form by choosing the following link: Custom Logo Inquiry http://yeti.com/custom-logo-coolers/
{!User.CommunityNickname} Account Management Team YETI 512.394.0222 sales@yeti.com yeti.com
